name: [Task] Add date of birth field in user registration page
description: Add date of birth field in user registration page
llmTaskExplanation: Add a 'date of birth' field to the user registration page. This involves updating the user registration form component to include a new input field for the date of birth. Ensure that the field is properly validated and integrated with the existing form submission logic.
validations: The date of birth field should accept valid date formats (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD).
The date of birth should not be a future date.
The user should be at least 18 years old.
The field should be required and not allow empty submissions.
unitTests: Test that the form renders with the date of birth field.
Test that submitting the form with a valid date of birth succeeds.
Test that submitting the form with a future date of birth fails.
Test that submitting the form with a date of birth indicating the user is under 18 fails.
Test that submitting the form with an empty date of birth field fails.
acceptanceCriteria: Given a user on the registration page, when they view the form, then they should see a date of birth field.
Given a user enters a valid date of birth, when they submit the form, then the registration should succeed.
Given a user enters a future date of birth, when they submit the form, then they should see an error message.
Given a user enters a date of birth indicating they are under 18, when they submit the form, then they should see an error message.
Given a user leaves the date of birth field empty, when they submit the form, then they should see an error message.
technicalDependencies: Use existing form validation libraries or utilities if available in the project.
security: Ensure the date of birth input is sanitized to prevent injection attacks.
Validate the date of birth on the server-side as well to ensure data integrity.
performance: Ensure the addition of the date of birth field does not significantly impact form load times.
businessContext: The date of birth is required to ensure users meet age requirements for registration.
otherNotes: Consider adding a tooltip or help text to guide users on the correct date format.
